description: Overview of MongoDB Atlas cluster metrics.

panels.description: An inventory table for shard nodes in the environment.
panels.title: Shard nodes

panels.description: An inventory table for config nodes in the environment.
panels.title: Config nodes

panels.description: An inventory table for mongos nodes in the environment.
panels.title: mongos nodes

panels.description: The number of read and write I/O's processed.
panels.title: Hardware I/O

panels.description: The amount of time spent waiting for I/O requests.
panels.title: Hardware I/O wait time / $__interval

panels.description: The amount of time spent servicing CPU interrupts.
panels.title: Hardware CPU interrupt service time / $__interval

panels.description: The amount of RAM and virtual memory being used.
panels.title: Memory used

panels.description: The percentage of hardware space used.
panels.title: Disk space usage

panels.description: The number of distinct requests that the server has received.
panels.title: Network requests

panels.description: The number of bytes sent and received over network connections.
panels.title: Network throughput

panels.description: The rate of DNS and SSL operations that took longer than 1 second.
panels.title: Slow requests

panels.description: The rate of incoming connections to the cluster created.
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: The number of read and write operations.
panels.title: Read/Write operations

panels.description: The number of insert, query, update, and delete operations.
panels.title: Operations

panels.description: The latency for read and write operations.
panels.title: Read/Write latency / $__interval

panels.description: The number of reads and writes queued because of a lock.
panels.title: Current queue

panels.description: The number of reads and writes being actively performed by connected clients.
panels.title: Active client operations

panels.description: The number of deadlocks for database level locks.
panels.title: Database deadlocks / $__interval

panels.description: The number of times lock acquisitions encounter waits for database level locks.

targets.refId: Database intent exclusive lock wait count
Database intent shared lock wait count
